name: HEXDISCS
description:
HEXDISCS 

by Arnold Rauers (Tinytouchtales) made for the 2020 DISC ROOM JAM. 

Sound FX provided by DOSEONE through the DISC ROOM JAM.

Gameplay

Collect golden orbs and avoid deadly discs.

Goal

Collect as many golden orbs as possible by moving your character through a hex grid filled with deadly discs before getting hit.

Interaction

Click on the movement action cards to move your character. Click a Hex tile that is not occupied by a disc to activate the rotation mode. Drag and spin highlighted hexes to reposition your character, discs or the orb. Confirm your move by clicking again. 

Disclaimer: This game was created in one week and will contain major bugs and issue!
